My Work

Check out some of my projects...

Moody POS

This application is a minimal PoS that handles a menu with tables and checks for a restaurant. It was built to learn the skills of async operations using a Redux store.

View Project

Flash Fluent

An application utilizing the spaced repetition learning technique. This project demonstrates the use of data structures in a database and Token based user authentication.

View Project

Commit2Win

A tool to track a GitHub users repository data utilizing the official GitHub API. This group project helped develop skills working as a team and with set roles.
